verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> le-'A-Saf of Asaph לָמָ֣ה <WH4100> la-Mah why אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God זָנַ֣חְתָּ <WH2186> za-Nach-ta why hast thou cast [us] off לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach; alway יֶעְשַׁ֥ן <WH6225> ye'-Shan smoke אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <WH639> 'ap-pe-cha, anger בְּצֹ֣אן <WH6629> be-Tzon against the sheep מַרְעִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH4830> mar-'i-Te-cha. flock

זְכֹ֤ר <WH2142> ze-Chor Remember עֲדָתְךָ֨׀ <WH5712> 'a-da-te-Cha thy congregation קָ֘נִ֤יתָ <WH7069> ka-Ni-ta [which] thou hast purchased קֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> Ke-dem, of old גָּ֭אַלְתָּ <WH1350> Ga-'al-ta [which] thou hast redeemed שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> She-vet the rod נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> na-cha-la-Te-cha; of thine inheritance הַר־ <WH2022> har- this mount צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon, Zion זֶ֤ה׀ <WH2088> zeh this שָׁכַ֬נְתָּ <WH7931> sha-Chan-ta wherein thou hast dwelt בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

הָרִ֣ימָה <WH7311> ha-Ri-mah Lift up פְ֭עָמֶיךָ <WH6471> Fe-'a-mei-cha thy feet לְמַשֻּׁא֣וֹת <WH4876> le-mash-shu-'ot desolations נֶ֑צַח <WH5331> Ne-tzach; unto the perpetual כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- everything הֵרַ֖ע <WH7489> he-Ra' hath done wickedly אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> o-Yev [even] all [that] the enemy בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> bak-Ko-desh. in the sanctuary

שָׁאֲג֣וּ <WH7580> sha-'a-Gu roar צֹ֭רְרֶיךָ <WH6887> Tzo-re-rei-cha Thine enemies בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst מוֹעֲדֶ֑ךָ <WH4150> mo-'a-De-cha; of thy congregations שָׂ֖מוּ <WH7760> Sa-mu they set up אוֹתֹתָ֣ם <WH226> o-to-Tam their ensigns אֹתֽוֹת׃ <WH226> o-Tot. [for] signs

יִ֭וָּדַע <WH3045> Yiv-va-da' [A man] was famous כְּמֵבִ֣יא <WH935> ke-me-Vi had lifted לְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> le-Ma-'e-lah; above בִּֽסֲבָךְ־ <WH5442> bi-sa-voch- upon the thick עֵ֝֗ץ <WH6086> 'Etz, trees קַרְדֻּמּֽוֹת׃ <WH7134> kar-dum-Mot. axes

וְעֵת ve-'et כוְ֭עַתָּה Ve-'at-tah קפִּתּוּחֶ֣יהָ <WH6603> pit-tu-Chei-ha the carved work יָּ֑חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad; thereof at once בְּכַשִּׁ֥יל <WH3781> be-chash-Shil with axes וְ֝כֵֽילַפֹּ֗ת <WH3597> ve-chei-lap-Pot, and hammers יַהֲלֹמֽוּן׃ <WH1986> ya-ha-lo-Mun. But now they break down

שִׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> shil-Chu They have cast בָ֭אֵשׁ <WH784> Va-'esh fire מִקְדָּשֶׁ֑ךָ <WH4720> mik-da-She-cha; into thy sanctuary לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz, to the ground חִלְּל֥וּ <WH2490> chil-le-Lu they have defiled מִֽשְׁכַּן־ <WH4908> mish-kan- [by casting down] the dwelling place שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. of thy name

אָמְר֣וּ <WH559> 'a-me-Ru They said בְ֭לִבָּם <WH3820> Ve-lib-bom in their hearts נִינָ֣ם <WH3238> ni-Nam Let us destroy יָ֑חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad; them together שָׂרְפ֖וּ <WH8313> sa-re-Fu they have burned up כָל־ <WH3605> chol all מוֹעֲדֵי־ <WH4150> mo-'a-dei- all the synagogues אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the land

אֽוֹתֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH226> o-to-Tei-nu, not our signs לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nor רָ֫אִ֥ינוּ <WH7200> ra-'I-nu We see אֵֽין־ <WH369> 'ein- There ע֥וֹד <WH5750> od longer נָבִ֑יא <WH5030> na-Vi; [there is] no more any prophet וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor אִ֝תָּ֗נוּ <WH854> 'it-Ta-nu, among יֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> yo-De-a' neither [is there] among us any that knoweth עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- how long מָֽה׃ <WH4100> Mah. how

עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָתַ֣י <WH4970> ma-Tai How אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God יְחָ֣רֶף <WH2778> ye-Cha-ref reproach צָ֑ר <WH6862> Tzar; how long shall the adversary יְנָ֘אֵ֤ץ <WH5006> ye-Na-'Etz blaspheme אוֹיֵ֖ב <WH341> o-Yev ;shall the enemy שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha thy name לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach. alway

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why תָשִׁ֣יב <WH7725> ta-Shiv Why withdrawest יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> Ya-de-cha thou thy hand וִֽימִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> vi-mi-Ne-cha; your right מִקֶּ֖רֶב <WH7130> mik-Ke-rev [it] out of; חֹוקְךָ chok-cha כחֵֽיקְךָ֣ <WH2436> chei-ke-Cha bosom קכַלֵּֽה׃ <WH3615> chal-Leh. destroy

וֵ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> Ve-lo-him For God מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> mal-Ki [is] my King מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem; of old פֹּעֵ֥ל <WH6466> po-'El working יְ֝שׁוּע֗וֹת <WH3444> ye-shu-'ot, salvation בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You פוֹרַ֣רְתָּ <WH6565> fo-Rar-ta Thou didst divide בְעָזְּךָ֣ <WH5797> ve-'az-ze-Cha by thy strength יָ֑ם <WH3220> Yam; the sea שִׁבַּ֖רְתָּ <WH7665> shib-Bar-ta thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ra-Shei the heads תַ֝נִּינִ֗ים <WH8577> tan-ni-Nim, of the dragons עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim. in the waters

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You רִ֭צַּצְתָּ <WH7533> Ritz-tzatz-ta Thou brakest רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei the heads לִוְיָתָ֑ן <WH3882> liv-ya-Tan; of leviathan תִּתְּנֶ֥נּוּ <WH5414> tit-te-Nen-nu in pieces [and] gavest מַ֝אֲכָ֗ל <WH3978> ma-'a-Chal, him [to be] meat לְעָ֣ם <WH5971> le-'Am to the people לְצִיִּֽים׃ <WH6728> le-tzi-Yim. inhabiting the wilderness

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You בָ֭קַעְתָּ <WH1234> Va-ka'-ta Thou didst cleave מַעְיָ֣ן <WH4599> ma'-Yan the fountain וָנָ֑חַל <WH5158> va-Na-chal; and the flood אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You ה֝וֹבַ֗שְׁתָּ <WH3001> ho-Vash-ta, thou driedst up נַהֲר֥וֹת <WH5104> na-ha-Rot rivers אֵיתָֽן׃ <WH386> 'ei-Tan. mighty

לְךָ֣ le-Cha י֭וֹם <WH3117> Yom The day אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also לְךָ֥ le-Cha לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> La-ye-lah; [is] thine the night אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You הֲ֝כִינ֗וֹתָ <WH3559> ha-chi-No-ta, also [is] thine thou hast prepared מָא֥וֹר <WH3974> ma-'or the light וָשָֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> va-Sha-mesh. and the sun

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You הִ֭צַּבְתָּ <WH5324> Hitz-tzav-ta Thou hast set כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all גְּבוּל֣וֹת <WH1367> ge-vu-Lot all the borders אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth קַ֥יִץ <WH7019> Ka-yitz summer וָ֝חֹ֗רֶף <WH2779> va-Cho-ref, and winter אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You יְצַרְתָּם׃ <WH3335> ye-tzar-tam thou hast made

זְכָר־ <WH2142> ze-chor- Remember זֹ֗את <WH2063> Zot, likewise א֭וֹיֵב <WH341> o-yev this [that] the enemy חֵרֵ֣ף׀ <WH2778> che-Ref hath reproached יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; O LORD וְעַ֥ם <WH5971> ve-'Am people נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> na-Val, and [that] the foolish נִֽאֲצ֥וּ <WH5006> ni-'a-Tzu have blasphemed שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. thy name

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> tit-Ten O deliver לְ֭חַיַּת <WH2416> Le-chai-yat unto the multitude נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh not the soul תּוֹרֶ֑ךָ <WH8449> to-Re-cha; of thy turtledove חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> chai-Yat not the congregation עֲ֝נִיֶּ֗יךָ <WH6041> 'a-ni-Yei-cha, of thy poor אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> tish-Kach [of the wicked] forget לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach. for ever

הַבֵּ֥ט <WH5027> hab-Bet Have respect לַבְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> lab-be-Rit; unto the covenant כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for מָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> mal-'U are full מַחֲשַׁכֵּי־ <WH4285> ma-cha-shak-kei- for the dark אֶ֝֗רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz, places of the earth נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> ne-'ot of the habitations חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> cha-Mas. of cruelty

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay יָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> ya-Sho return דַּ֣ךְ <WH1790> dach O let not the oppressed נִכְלָ֑ם <WH3637> nich-Lam; ashamed עָנִ֥י <WH6041> 'a-Ni let the poor וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <WH34> ve-'ev-Yon, and needy יְֽהַלְל֥וּ <WH1984> ye-hal-Lu praise שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> she-Me-cha. thy name

קוּמָ֣ה <WH6965> ku-Mah Arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God רִיבָ֣ה <WH7378> ri-Vah plead רִיבֶ֑ךָ <WH7379> ri-Ve-cha; thine own cause זְכֹ֥ר <WH2142> ze-Chor remember חֶרְפָּתְךָ֥ <WH2781> cher-pa-te-Cha reproacheth מִנִּי־ <WH4480> min-ni- at נָ֝בָ֗ל <WH5036> na-Val, how the foolish man כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. thee daily

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּ֭שְׁכַּח <WH7911> Tish-kach Forget ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol not the voice צֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <WH6887> tzo-re-Rei-cha; of thine enemies שְׁא֥וֹן <WH7588> she-'on the tumult קָ֝מֶ֗יךָ <WH6965> ka-Mei-cha, of those that rise up עֹלֶ֥ה <WH5927> 'o-Leh against thee increaseth תָמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> ta-Mid. continually
